subspecies.applySubspeciesChanges:
[#targetedBody.setCovering(BODY_COVERING_TYPE_HAIR_HUMAN, COVERING_PATTERN_NONE, COVERING_MODIFIER_SMOOTH, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false)] [#targetedBody.setCovering(BODY_COVERING_TYPE_BODY_HAIR_HUMAN, COVERING_PATTERN_NONE, COVERING_MODIFIER_COARSE, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false)] #IF(targetedBody.getCovering(BODY_COVERING_TYPE_HUMAN, true).getPrimaryColour().getDarkerLinkedColours().contains(COLOUR_SKIN_TANNED)) [#targetedBody.setCovering(BODY_COVERING_TYPE_HUMAN, COVERING_PATTERN_NONE, COVERING_MODIFIER_SMOOTH, COLOUR_SKIN_TANNED, false, COLOUR_SKIN_TANNED, false)] #ENDIF
[#targetedBody.setCovering(BODY_COVERING_TYPE_LYCAN_FUR, COVERING_PATTERN_NONE, COVERING_MODIFIER_SHAGGY, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false)] [#targetedBody.setCovering(BODY_COVERING_TYPE_HAIR_LYCAN_FUR, COVERING_PATTERN_NONE, COVERING_MODIFIER_FURRY, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false)] [#targetedBody.setCovering(BODY_COVERING_TYPE_BODY_HAIR_LYCAN_FUR, COVERING_PATTERN_NONE, COVERING_MODIFIER_FURRY, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false, COLOUR_COVERING_SANDY, false)] [#targetedBody.updateCoverings(true, true, true, true)]
[#targetedBody.setEarType(EAR_TYPE_mintychip_wolf_earJackal)]
subspecies.description: An anthropomorphic jackal, known as an 'jackal-morph' when bipedal, and an 'jackaltaur' when the lower body is that of a typically-oversized feral jackal. To be identified as a jackal-morph, a character must be a wolf-morph that has jackal ears.â€‹
subspecies.statusEffectDescription: [npc.NamePos] jackal-like body is both strong and highly resistant to the heat. [npc.She] also often [npc.verb(get)] powerful urges to try and dominate people [npc.she] [npc.verb(meet)].
